sentences.english: Ying falsely claim is the waiter here, then panic away.

definition: to feign/to pretend to be/to pass oneself off as
to impersonate/to act the part of sb/to disguise oneself as sb else
to take sth to be true
to entice/to lure/to scam/to hoodwink/to decoy

to make use of/to use sth as pretext/under false pretenses/under the guise of/masquerading as/lenient/tolerant/loan character (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters)/character acquiring meanings by phonetic association/also called phonetic loan
victim (of a criminal)/party involved (in a dispute etc)/main instigator
to meet with a refusal (e.g. visa)/to have an application rejected
to argue (that)/to allege/to dispute/to plead (e.g. not guilty)
